details:
verb
- come to pass
= example: come to pass
= synonyms: pass
- come into being
= synonyms: materialise, materialize
- happen, occur, or be the case in the course of events or by chance
= example: happen, occur, or be the case in the course of events or by chance
= synonyms: befall
- come upon, as if by accident
= synonyms: find
- chance to be or do something, without intention or causation
= example: chance to be or do something, without intention or causation
